method: Cook sushi rice according to package instructions.
In a small bowl, mix rice vinegar and sugar until the sugar dissolves.
Transfer the cooked rice to a large bowl and pour the vinegar mixture over it.
Mix the rice gently to evenly coat it with the vinegar.
Place a sheet of seaweed on a bamboo sushi mat.
Spread a thin layer of sushi rice over the seaweed, leaving a small border.
Place avocado and cucumber slices on top of the rice.
Roll the sushi tightly using the bamboo mat.
Slice the sushi roll into bite-sized pieces.
Serve the tickle-me sushi rolls with soy sauce and a drizzle of laughter.
